steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Leather';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse material IDs that correspond to the material ID for "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT cutting_task_id FROM cutting_material_allocation WHERE warehouse_material_id IN ('7');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that use the warehouse material IDs for "Leather"

steps.input:
Retrieve the details of the cutting tasks using the cutting task IDs
["tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 15}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 16}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 17}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 18}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 20}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 25}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 27}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 32}, Find the cutting task details"]
